thread.title: Curt Schilling tweets at Donald Trump that ‘ISIS’ is winning the Democratic debate - Politics
thread.title_full: Curt Schilling tweets at Donald Trump that ‘ISIS’ is winning the Democratic debate - Politics

author: boston.com
title: Curt Schilling tweets at Donald Trump that ‘ISIS’ is winning the Democratic debate - Politics
text:
Never shy of stating his two cents on political issues, former Red Sox pitcher Curt Schilling tweeted at Donald Trump that “ISIS” was winning the Democratic debate on Tuesday night.
@realDonaldTrump ISIS
— Curt Schilling (@gehrig38) October 14, 2015 Schilling got himself in trouble on Twitter in August when he shared a meme comparing Muslims to Germans during World War II. After that post, ESPN suspended him as a color commentator for the rest of the baseball season.
